info.title: LMS BPSDM MALUT API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for LMS BPSDM MALUT module

get.description: Returns paginated list of all admins and instructors

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter results (searches username, email, nama_lengkap and nip)

post.description: Create a new admin or instructor account (Super Admin only)

message.example: Unauthorized. Only Super Admin can create new admin/instruktur.

get.summary: Get admin or instructor by ID
get.description: Returns specific admin or instructor details

put.description: Update admin or instructor information (Super Admin can update any account, regular admin can only update their own)

nama_dengan_gelar.example: Prof. Dr. Updated Instructor Name, M.Pd, Ph.D

message.example: Unauthorized. You can only update your own account.

delete.description: Delete admin or instructor account (Super Admin only)

message.example: Unauthorized. Only Super Admin can delete admin/instruktur.

422.description: Cannot delete the last Super Admin

message.example: Cannot delete the last Super Admin account.

post.description: Login using email or username and password
Logout and revoke current access token

get.description: Get current authenticated user information

get.description: Returns paginated list of all Kursus with filtering options

get.description: Returns paginated list of all Kursus with filtering options

post.description: Enroll a participant in a course

Returns list of all Persyaratan Kursus with optional filtering by course ID

post.description: Create a new prerequisite relationship between courses

kursus_id.description: The course that requires a prerequisite

kursus_prasyarat_id.description: The prerequisite course that must be completed

Kursus ini wajib diselesaikan sebelum mengikuti kursus lanjutan

get.description: Returns list of all Materi Kursus with optional filtering by module ID, content type, and published status

deskripsi.example: Video pengantar tentang konsep dasar data science

post.description: Create a new material (content) for a module, supports both JSON and multipart/form-data

file.description: Required unless tipe_konten is 'link'. Max size: 100MB

deskripsi.example: Video pengantar tentang konsep dasar data science
Materi tentang konsep dasar data science
Video pengantar tentang konsep dasar data science

get.description: Returns specific course material details

deskripsi.example: Video pengantar tentang konsep dasar data science

put.description: Update an existing course material using JSON (for non-file updates)

deskripsi.example: Video pengantar yang diperbarui tentang konsep dasar data science
Video pengantar yang diperbarui tentang konsep dasar data science

delete.description: Delete a course material and its associated file (if exists)

post.description: Update the order/sequence of multiple materials within a module at once

get.description: Retrieves all progress records with optional filtering by peserta ID, materi ID, and completion status

post.description: Creates a new progress record for a participant and material

422.description: Validation error or progress already exists

message.example: Progress already exists for this peserta and materi.

get.description: Retrieves a specific progress record by ID

put.description: Updates a specific progress record by ID

delete.description: Deletes a specific progress record by ID

post.description: Updates or creates a progress record with a specific progress percentage

get.description: Returns list of all Modul Kursus with optional filtering by course ID and published status

deskripsi.example: Modul pengantar tentang konsep dasar data science

post.description: Create a new module for a course

urutan.description: Module order/sequence (optional, will be set to the last position if not provided)
